attributes.action: Grant unmarried Fathers full parental rights and responsibilities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is to petition the government to grant unmarried fathers the same rights as unmarried mothers, allowing split residency and equal say in the care of a child, without having the vast expense of court actions.
Also to force parties to abide by court rulings and to grant equal rights unless good cause is shown otherwise.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
